Write-Up Text: Australians will soon receive much-needed boosts to their finances from the federal budget including an increase to the Commonwealth Rent Assistance program cheaper childcare and energy bill relief. Money has also been allocated to support veterans and Jobseeker recipients while reforms to the Pharmaceutical Benefits Scheme will lower the cost of medicines. Despite some misinformation the budget papers themselves highlight family tax benefits and energy bill relief. Overall the Federal Budget provides a glimmer of hope for many struggling Australians.
